page.title: 07School Election-Polling Day
page.content:
On Polling Day we all went into the hall where people were going to vote.When we were there,the Chairperson introduced the three candidates and their Election Agents. The Election Agents introduced their party representatives.
Each candidate made a speech of what they planned to do.They had lots of different ideas for Penrhiwceiber.
After they had spoken we had a chance to vote.
We had to give our names which were then crossed off a list and go to a booth where we had a printed ballot form to vote on. A photographer from the paper took our photograph.
